name: Square World
description:
For the 48 hour  GMTK game jam of 2020, where the theme "Out of control" is.

In Square world, you try to make the world grow bigger, by going with the beat of the internal pulse of the world. If you get in harmony the world gets bigger. But if you mis, the world gets out of control and gets destroyed.

How to play:

-Tap when the form of the pulse is the same size as a layer of the world.

Credits:
